title: T205 Set For Sale (mostly PSA & SGC graded) w/ Most Variations & a Drum Back
author: bdecsports

posts.post_title: T205 Set For Sale (mostly PSA & SGC graded) w/ Most Variations & a Drum Back
posts.post_content:
Hi,

We recently acquired a T205 tobacco baseball card set, mostly graded by PSA or SGC, it includes most of the variations (missing the Hoblitzell no stats), and it includes a Latham Drum back.  Here are a couple of group shots, and feel free to email me for a complete spread sheet list of every card.

Price $25,000

Regards,

Bryan Dec
